reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and thought-provoking assignments. Sometimes a bit disorganized.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant mind, explains complex concepts clearly. Challenging but rewarding course.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Inspiring teacher with a passion for the subject. Experiments were fascinating.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Brilliant mathematician, but lectures can be hard to follow. Office hours very helpful.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Incredible field experience shared. Makes primatology accessible and exciting.

reviews.subject: Astrophysics
reviews.review: Mind-bending concepts explained well. Course material is extremely challenging.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Outdated theories presented as fact. Interesting historical perspective though.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Revolutionary ideas presented clearly. Heavy workload but worth the effort.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Field trips were eye-opening and informative.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Engaging storyteller. Sometimes oversimplifies complex historical events.

reviews.subject: Animal Science
reviews.review: Unique perspective and practical knowledge. Hands-on learning experiences were excellent.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Makes complex physics fun and understandable. Eccentric but brilliant teacher.

reviews.subject: Social Work
reviews.review: Insightful lectures on vulnerability and shame. Some readings felt repetitive.

reviews.subject: Astronomy
reviews.review: Inspiring role model. Clear explanations and exciting recent discoveries shared.

reviews.subject: Neurology
reviews.review: Fascinating case studies. Sometimes goes off on tangents during lectures.

reviews.subject: Theoretical Physics
reviews.review: Entertaining lecturer but often oversimplifies. More rigor would be appreciated.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Disorganized lectures and unclear expectations. Interesting topic poorly delivered.

reviews.subject: Astrophysics
reviews.review: Charismatic teacher. Occasionally spends too much time on anecdotes instead of content.

reviews.subject: Creative Writing
reviews.review: Inspirational and nurturing. Provides insightful feedback on writing assignments.

reviews.subject: Geography
reviews.review: Interesting theories but some controversial claims. Stimulates good debates in class.
